HelpEntry.Text: The name of the Crafting Recipe.
Define the amount of experience your player will gain after successfully crafted item.
Define icon if you are going to use Crafting Book functionality implemented in the Atavism 2018.3.
Defines different result for this craft.
The item made by completing this crafting recipe.
Quantity that will be created. This recipe can create up to 4 items.
The skill related to the crafting recipe. Used to check if the user has a high enough skill level to craft the item, and to allow the chance to skill up in that skill.
The skill level required to complete the craft.
What station type the crafting recipe requires to be used on.
If items required should be exactly in the defined slot (only for grid based crafting).
The item required in this slot. Leave empty if no item is needed in this slot.
Maximum amount of this currency a player can have.
